long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Credit Repair Marketing Content can be easily found with 
Copy N Content. You Can find Content for ANY Niche!

This Version Works With The NEW UPDATED VERSION OF FACEBOOK 09/2020

Get Credit Repair Marketing Content and Customize your Facebook experience by filtering out ads or posts from your newsfeed, groups, pages or profile based on keywords.
Customize your experience on Facebook by filtering out posts or ads or both based on your preference.

Copy N Content is an easy to use CHROME extension which helps you to keep your Facebook feed clean and help find Credit Repair Marketing Content. With the help of this extension now you can filter what you want to see on your Facebook news feed and easily find Marketing Content. You can use any set of keywords and decide if you just want to see posts or ads or if you don't want to see post or ads based on the given keywords.

You choose what you want to see and how you want to see them. You can use this extension to check our relevant post based on any given keywords from anywhere on Facebook (your news feed, groups, pages, other profiles).

User should install it if they just want to filter between post or sponsored ads. It will help an user to save their time while scrolling through Facebook to be able to choose if they want to see or donâ€™t want to see post or sponsored ads .
